channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump wants Supreme Court to pause TikTok ban
Trump just asked the Supreme Court to delay the national TikTok ban so he can weigh in on it after he takes office
item.description: Trump has reversed his position on the popular app, having tried to ban it during his first term in office.

item.title: A massive Chinese campaign just gave Beijing unprecedented access to private texts and phone conversations for an unknown number of Americans
item.description: The Chinese government has denied responsibility for the hacking.

item.title: Elon Musk admits he takes an Ozempic-like weight-loss drug that RFK Jr. wants to restrict
item.description: Elon Musk is calling himself “Ozempic Santa.”

item.title: Will a sophomore jinx keep ‘Squid Game’ from putting up big numbers for Netflix?
Donald Trump asks Supreme Court to pause looming TikTok ban so he can use his ‘dealmaking expertise’ to negotiate a resolution
item.description: Trump said the court should give him time after his Jan. 20 inauguration to “seek a negotiated resolution” of the dispute.

item.title: How Fortune 500 Europe’s C-suite execs spend their time when they’re not hard at work—from puzzle-solving to jumping rope
item.description: From mind-bending puzzles to sports, Fortune 500 Europe's C-suite execs have many interests. The common thread? It makes them better leaders, they say...

item.title: Biden-to-Trump transition is but one big change coming to student-loan landscape
Here’s how close Apple came this week to becoming the first $4 trillion company
Trump may still have tools to defuse the ‘MAGA civil war’ over immigration
